title: Boris Johnson news live: Latest Brexit updates as extension letter sent to EU
text:
Boris Johnson has been accused of “behaving like a spoilt brat” after he sent an unsigned letter to the EU asking for an extension to Brexit.

The prime minister was forced to make the request after a humiliating defeat in the House of Commons when MPs voted to withhold approval for his withdrawal agreement.

However he also sent a second letter saying a further delay would “damage the interests of the UK” and he would still attempt to meet the 31 October deadline.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

Labour shadow chancellor John McDonnell said Mr Johnson “has to abide by the law” and may be in contempt of parliament, adding: ”He’s behaving a bit like a spoilt brat.”
